TopicTitle: How To REALLY Get Angry At Space Science Deniers

Articles.Content:
Just accidentally clicked on this video the other day and OMG.... THERE REALLY ARE STILL FLAT EARTHERS OUT THERE.

[snip] There really are some idiots out there. *gobsmacked*

I saw this too. Its soo sad.

I want to see what a flat earth model of solar system looks like, cuz I can't even imagine one that makes sense.

I mean, if its daytime and you call someone in Africa or china or something and its nighttime....that's only possible if the planet were round. If it were flat, it would have to be daytime everywhere or nighttime everywhere.
I've always wanted a Flat-Earther to go to the edge of the Earth and take a picture, showing where it stops.  Surely it can't be that hard, right?
"What is the mechanism to straighten it out?" he asks, while the grid fins are clearly visible and moving to adjust attitude. Gosh.

I mean, if its daytime and you call someone in Africa or china or something and its nighttime....that's only possible if the planet were round. If it were flat, it would have to be daytime everywhere or nighttime everywhere.

In his world there (probably) is no solar system. That's all garbage, invented to distract "us" so that "they" can easier take over the (chubby :-)) world.

 

A few days weeks ago an elder lady tried to convince me that the ptolemaic view is the right one and the earth is in the middle and one day soon we'll all see. I tried to explain that Ptolemaeus didn't work well, discarded obvious data which didn't fit and encouraged his pupils to do the same. A no go even for the times at the end of the antique world, when 400 years earlier Eratosthenes already had accurately calculated the earths circumference.  And that Ptolemaeus view mainly came to some sort of an "official view" after the end of the middle ages to strengthen the church's position against all those newfangled stuff like Kepler, Kopernicus and so on ;-)

But she wouldn't even listen.

There is no way to convince a believer :-)

Elephants are a myth, nothing but government propaganda. I supposedly rode on one once, but I'm pretty sure it was two zebras in an overcoat.

As for the Earth, under the ground is just an infinite universe of solid rock, obviously, thats all you find if you dig down. If the Earth was a ball, or a sheet, then you'd be able to dig right through it but no one ever has because the universe is solid rock outside of the hollow Earth.

Hmmmm.... If the ISS is a lie and nobody has ever been to space then I would so love to ask the guy what is the definition of a religious astronaut like Buzz Aldrin is.

Plus all those rockets fired off... where the heck did they go? And how does GPS work. Oooh... I know... Scientists worked out how to log into God's Positioning System.

Well, at least the Hoillow Earth easily explains why they launch rockets in the Northern hemisphere, while satellites then fall somewhere in Australia or South America.
They just fly too fast and cross the hollow.

I don't know anyone who claims to believe that the sun goes around the earth, or that the earth is flat, etc.  I know a lot of people and they come from a variety of world views (political, religious [and not], economical, cultural, etc.) but none claim that space programs are bogus or that we can't fly through space to other planets and moons.  I'm confident that the conspiracy You Tubers/ Potatoes out there just want your attention.  They sure don't get mine.

That said, if I ever become aware of anyone like that, I'll refer them to these forums.

The Flat Earth Society was a student exercise in humor, and most likely still is.

An exercise to be different, not believe and to challenge everything that you are fed via the media, and or propaganda.

This is what it's all about and nothing more... if you cannot see this and get upset by these things, they've exposed you as a sheep of the world.

Quiet humorous actually... see it for what it is

:-)

Yes, that has a religious touch. Flat earthers or earth centrics are harmless and not as numerous as the evolution deniers and intelligent designers. They should have our attention cause they try to influence education.

Hope that's not too political ...

Hah, that'd be pretty funny.  The sad thing being that they'd still continue to say that it is all Photoshop, or they'd just reiterate their nonsensical theory to fit more with what they'd seen.  Flat Earth believers aren't, and have never been, of any immediate or future threat to knowledge, or people, otherwise somebody would go through all the effort to prove them wrong.  But it's just the simple fact that is not a true issue, therefore nobody or conglomerate of people (NASA, ESA, etc.) are willing to go through all the effort.
